commenter_b: In America, the people are the government. We're a republic, where our elected officials are acting on our behalf. Otherwise, we're supposed to kick them out. Taxation is the idea that no one can amass keep lot of money without a central authority to provide the infrastructure to make wealth creation possible, or the security to make created wealth sustainable. No one gets rich by themselves, and the people who work to make the rich people rich, or to keep the rich people rich, deserve an infrastructure they can survive on, too. Taxation makes a society fair, stable, and full of opportunity.
